Blue dye can be obtained from Aggie in Draynor Village or Ali the dyer in Pollnivneach in exchange for 2 woad leaves and 5 coins. It can also be purchased from Oronwen in Lletya or Guinevere in Prifddinas.

Blue dye is mainly used in the Goblin Diplomacy and Ghosts Ahoy quests. Blue dye can be used with a black cape (or any other colour) to create a blue cape. It can also be used to turn a black robe into a blue robe.

'''Blue dye''' can be obtained from [[Aggie]] in [[Draynor Village]] or [[Ali the dyer]] in [[Pollnivneach]] in exchange for 2 [[Woad leaf|woad leaves]] and 5 [[coins]]. It can also be purchased from [[Oronwen]] in [[Lletya]] or [[Guinevere]] in [[Prifddinas]].

Blue dye is mainly used in the [[Goblin Diplomacy]] and [[Ghosts Ahoy]] [[quests]]. Blue dye can be used with a [[black cape]] (or any other colour) to create a [[blue cape]]. It can also be used to turn a [[black robe]] into a [[blue robe]].
